title: I Became The Mother Of The Strongest Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Children   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Demons   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
description:
Yuria was just a fleeting extra in a novel. No one would have even spotted her in the novel itself.

But all of a sudden, she became the mother of the strongest villain after she accidentally adopted him.

And that son…

“Just because you’re my father doesn’t mean you’re my mother’s husband. We’re connected just because of blood. Don’t even think of becoming my mother’s husband.”

His father didn’t even appear in the novel, but this son of hers grew up so wonderfully that he knew how to threaten his father.>
